Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can be more objective, however its feedback is not always helpful. Teacher feedback is often subjective, sometimes harder to understand the point they are trying to convey. Depending on the teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The teacher feedback sometimes contradicted what the assessment was asking, so it can be frustrating when the feedback given is to change something you were told to do by faculty. I donâ€™t often follow feedback from GenAI.
